function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of contagious diseases in small accommodation units due to shortened social distance with tourists","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission and outbreak of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene protocols, social distancing measures, and ventilation systems in small accommodation units","Technologies":"Air purification systems, contactless check-in systems, automated cleaning systems","People":"Tourists, staff in small accommodation units","Owner":"Accommodation owners, management, government"}]}
